panels.description: Solana client software version running on the node.
panels.title: Solana Client Versions

panels.description: Number of slots that the node is behind.
panels.title: Solana Behind

panels.description: Rate at which the validator produces blocks (and skips slots) per minute.
panels.title: Validator Block Production Rate

panels.description: Total number of transactions per block.
panels.title: Validator Block Size

panels.description: The distance from the configured nodekey's root slot to the maximum observed root slot.
panels.title: Validator Root Slot Slack Distance

panels.description: Skip rate grouped by epoch, similar to validators.app
panels.title: Epoch Skip Rate

panels.description: The distance between the highest on-chain last vote slot, and the configured nodekey's last vote slot.
panels.title: Validator Vote Slack Distance

panels.description: Average skip rate over a running window.
panels.title: Running Skip Rate

panels.description: Balance (in SOL) of monitored Solana addresses.
panels.title: Solana Account Balances

panels.description: Solana transaction fee rewards earned by tracked validators.
panels.title: Fee Rewards

panels.description: Hourly average amount of fee lamports earned per transaction.

targets.expr:
1e9 * 
sum by (nodekey) (increase(solana_validator_fee_rewards_total{app="$chain_name", hostname="$host"}[1h]))
/
sum by (nodekey) (sum_over_time(solana_validator_block_size{app="$chain_name", hostname="$host"}[1h]))

panels.title: WIP: Lamports Per Transaction

panels.description: Solana transaction fee rewards (in SOL) earned in different epochs.
panels.title: Solana Fee Rewards

panels.description: Solana Inflation rewards (in SOL) for different epochs.
panels.title: Solana Inflation Rewards

panels.description: How far the cluster is through the current epoch.
panels.title: Epoch Progress

panels.description: Rolling cluster skip rate with different window lengths.
panels.title: Cluster Skip Rate

list.description:
Select a host to view cluster-stats from. 

NOTE: Make sure this host is running without light mode.
list.label: Host
list.name: host
